title: Looking for people to do Clash with
body: message me if you want to make a team, I am a support player, heads up I am in bronze, just looking for some people who don't get triggered easily and can have a laugh, thanks.

replies.body: Just bumping this to say we are looking for 2 more around bronze rank? or whatever I don't mind at this point, just want anyone that doesn't get angry easily, that can understand that this is just a game and wanting someone who can laugh & joke around with, well still trying to do there best to work as a team instead of cry ff in the first 5mins, thanks.
Hey I'm silver 3 and currently doing ADC. I'll join you guys if you're down for it. IGN is "The Argonäut" copy and paste it cause of the a.
I mean sure, if your fine with 3 bronzes members on our team and 1 gold, dont feel like we are going to win anything more for fun
Hey, I'm' a bronze 3 ADC main also looking for a Clash team :)
yer sounds good still need 2 more then
